typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_id as string,
		salutation as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as date,
		birth_country as string,
		email_address as string,
		phone_number as string,
		phone_number_type as string,
		address_id as string,
		country as string,
		county as string,
		state as string,
		city as string,
		street_number as string,
		street_name as string,
		zip as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> satCustomerAddress
source(output(
		HK_STORE_ID as binary,
		STORE_ID as string,
		LOAD_DTS as timestamp,
		REC_SRC as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> satcustomeraddressprev
satCustomerAddress select(mapColumn(
		customer_id,
		street_number,
		street_name,
		city,
		county,
		state,
		zip,
		country
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> customerselect
customerselect derive(HK_CUSTOMER_ID = md5(customer_id),
		LOAD_DTS = currentDate(),
		REC_SRC = 'Customer Address Load') ~> DerivedColumn1
customerselect, satcustomeraddressprev exists(customer_id==customer_id,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> SatCustomerExists
SatCustomerExists sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		customer_id as string,
		salutation as string,
		first_name as string,
		last_name as string,
		dob as date,
		birth_country as string,
		email_address as string,
		phone_number as string,
		phone_number_type as string,
		address_id as string,
		country as string,
		county as string,
		state as string,
		city as string,
		street_number as string,
		street_name as string,
		zip as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SATCustomerAddressLoad
